game.title: Retrieve the Lost Scroll
game.objective: Find and return the ancient scroll to Lena, the Local Scholar.
game.description: The local scholar requires the scroll for a crucial research project. The ruins are risky and filled with puzzles; be cautious as you search.

task.objective: Examine the entrance hall of the ancient ruins for clues or hidden passages.
task.description: Begin in the Ancient Ruins Entrance Hall and carefully inspect the area.

task.objective: Pass through the central chamber, avoiding traps and obstacles.
task.description: Maintain vigilance in the center of the ruins. Uncover any pointers to the scroll's location.

task.objective: Unlock and retrieve the lost scroll from the treasure room.
task.description: Challenge the stone door in the treasure room using your problem-solving skills.
